Hey! So you want to use Streetmix to improve the streets in your community. Awesome. Whether you're trying to reach your community better or customize Streetmix for your needs, this guide will help you out. Street design planning is all about trade-offs that must be made to balance the different needs of your community. Does your street require more traffic? Less traffic? Are more pedestrians and bikers better, or is traffic speed the most important factor?
